title: Team-Based Flipped Learning Design in Psychiatric Nursing Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational nursing theory and psychiatric terminology comprehension
context.additional_context: A psychiatric nursing education course promoting team collaboration and self-reflection in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners will collaboratively solve complex problems with team members during mental health nursing case analyses
Learners will explain ≥80% of core concepts using pre-provided digital resources (video/text)
Learners will document ≥3 clinically applicable communication techniques in weekly reflective journals

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
